Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.jiffle

Class JiffleProperties

Object
JiffleProperties
public class JiffleProperties extends Object
Helper class which reads the Jiffle properties file and provides values to other classes. It is used by Jiffle and org.eclipse.imagen.media.jiffle.parser.AbstractSourceGenerator.
Since:
0.1
Author:
Michael Bedward
